data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core SIONASCA, Loch Sionascaig, United Kingdom
Area: 607 ha. Large loch with rocky shoreline. Physiography: massive mountains and rocky outcrops. Surrounding vegetation: blanket bogs with Betula woodlands.
A chronostratigraphic comparison of late Weichselian and late Devensian subdivisions illustrated by two radiocarbon dated profiles from western Britain
